text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III (2019) Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Type FHD, GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB FireCuda, Per-Key RGB KB, Win10 Home, G731GW-DB76!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III (2019) Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Type FHD, GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB FireCuda, Per-Key RGB KB, Win10 Home, G731GW-DB76 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
